heading: About Us
paragraph:
Our office comprises top level private investigators, former members of various security systems, with extensive experience in a wide range of investigative fields. We operate with complete transparency and absolute discretion, and we pride ourselves on our professional approach with a focus on personal service.

We employ dozens of investigators nationwide, each with different skills tailored to various types of investigations. Our team includes former members of special units, police, and the ministry Of defense, for whom thinking outside the box is routine.

We operate under a license from the Ministry of Justice and are members of the Private Investigators Association in Israel.
